careers.title: Security Analyst
careers.description: Monitor security systems, analyze threats, and respond to security incidents.

careers.title: Penetration Tester
careers.description: Ethically hack systems to identify vulnerabilities and security weaknesses.

careers.title: Security Engineer
careers.description: Design, implement, and maintain security infrastructure and systems.

careers.title: Security Manager
careers.description: Lead security teams, develop policies, and manage security programs.

careers.title: Digital Forensics Analyst
careers.description: Investigate cybercrimes and analyze digital evidence for legal proceedings.
careers.skills: Forensic tools, evidence handling, legal knowledge

careers.title: Cloud Security Architect
careers.description: Design and implement security solutions for cloud environments.

entry.name: CompTIA A+
entry.description: IT fundamentals including basic security concepts and troubleshooting.

intermediate.name: CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker)
intermediate.description: Ethical hacking techniques and penetration testing methodologies.

intermediate.name: CySA+ (Cybersecurity Analyst+)

advanced.description: Comprehensive security management and leadership certification.
